identity.title: Rotating the Array Values to the Left by One Position

content.prompt: Construct a program that has a method that receives an array of values and returns the array rotated to the left by 1 position so that the value at the front of the array goes to the back and the order of the other values stays the same. For example, if the array is {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6}, the program will change it to {2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 1}.
